content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 4, Girona 1.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 4, Girona 1.
Goal!  Villarreal 4, Girona 1. Ikechukwu Uche (Villarreal) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Cani.
Foul by Toni Moral (Girona).
Olof Mellberg (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Joan Oriol (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcos Tébar (Girona).

Substitution, Girona. Eloi Amagat replaces Felipe.

Foul by Moisés Hurtado (Girona).
Jérémy Perbet (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Substitution, Girona. Juanlu Hens replaces David García.
Goal!  Villarreal 2, Girona 1. Jérémy Perbet (Villarreal) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonathan Pereira.
Substitution, Villarreal. Jonathan Pereira replaces Javier Aquino.
Offside, Villarreal. Mario Gaspar tries a through ball, but Jérémy Perbet is caught offside.

Substitution, Villarreal. Manu Trigueros replaces Héctor Canteros.
